sentences.sentence: Method to study the clinical information of operation mode and notice of 700 patients with eardrum-mastoiditis.
sentences.translation: 方法对700例入院行乳突根治术患者的临床资料(手术方式及术中注意事项)进行回顾性研究。

sentences.sentence: Acute otitis media episodes after treatment from the onset, starting after 2 weeks or longer, because the mastoid cortex damage, acute mastoiditis clinical manifestations may become apparent.
sentences.translation: 急性中耳炎发作后未治疗者，从起病开始后2周或更长时间，因乳突皮质受到破坏，急性乳突炎的临床表现可变得明显。
